reviewText: Very grim atmosphere. Grimy feel. They did a great job creating this slasher.

Coming from a big time movie collector i was surprised that it being as good as it is and very original... I heard of a movie similiar to something like this back 2002, a friend showed me something called "Hammer Man". Im not 100% sure if that is what it was called but the plot was similar to cross bearer. People might take this to be a bit over the top with the gore but i liked this low budget film and thought it was very original, something new you normally don't see in a lot of movies. It is interesting to see what people come up with when they think of these kinds of movies. I wish there more;

The film introduces us to a righteous vigilante intent on killing drug dealers, strippers, prostitutes, and pimps. The film then focuses on the life of a lesbian stripper (Natalie Jean) with a Philadelphia slang background. We then go back to the bloody killer (Isaac Williams) who uses a hammer to bash heads to produce some of the reddest blood around.

The plot pretty well sucked, but I have to give it 3 stars for all the sex and nudity...thank you Dawn Vaughn, Kacie Marie, Wyn Nugyen, Kalsey Lehman, Raichyl Sinversa, Suzi Pang, Brittany Reardon, Janet Searfoss and many more.
